mapper.select: /*하나의 컵 조회*/ SELECT cm.cup_QR_code, cm.static_code, cm.set_datetime, cm.admin_id, cm.up_datetime FROM cup_manage AS cm WHERE cm.cup_QR_code =#{cupQR};
/*컵 상태코드 조회*/ SELECT sc.static_code as staticCode, sc.static_code_content as staticCodeContent FROM static_code AS sc WHERE SUBSTRING_INDEX(sc.static_code,'_',1)='cup';
/*하루 총 출고 리스트*/ SELECT cast(dota.outTime AS CHAR(20)) AS upDatetime, dota.outAmount AS outAmount , dota.adminId AS adminId FROM day_out_total_amount AS dota ORDER BY dota.outTime;

/*현재 최종 재고*/ SELECT csm.final_stock FROM cup_stock_manage AS csm WHERE csm.cup_stock_manage_code = (SELECT concat('cup_stock_manage_code', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(cup_stock_manage_code, 'code', -1) AS UNSIGNED))) FROM cup_stock_manage);

/*컵 재고 조회*/ SELECT csm.stock_type AS stockType, csm.past_stock AS pastStock, csm.insert_stock AS insertStock, csm.final_stock AS finalStock, csm.admin_id AS adminId, cast(csm.up_datetime AS CHAR(20)) AS updateTime FROM cup_stock_manage AS csm ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(csm.cup_stock_manage_code,'code',-1) AS UNSIGNED)
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{rowPerPage};

/*컵 전체 이용 내역*/ SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING(crenh.cup_QR_code,6) AS UNSIGNED) AS num, um.user_id AS userId, um.user_name AS userName, um.user_nick AS userNick, crenh.user_bar_code AS userBarcode, crenh.cup_QR_code AS cupQR, cast(crenh.cup_rental_datetime AS CHAR(20)) AS rentalDateTime, cast(IFNULL(creth.cup_return_datetime,'') AS CHAR(20)) AS returnDateTime FROM user_manage AS um INNER JOIN cup_rental_history AS crenh ON um.user_id = crenh.user_id LEFT JOIN cup_return_history AS creth ON um.user_id = creth.user_id AND crenh.cup_QR_code = creth.cup_QR_code ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(crenh.cup_QR_code,6) AS UNSIGNED)
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{rowPerPage};
/*컵 이용 내역 전체 행의 갯수*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cup_rental_history AS crenh LEFT JOIN cup_return_history AS creth ON crenh.cup_QR_code = creth.cup_QR_code
